text: Roy Gibson (born 4 July 1924) is a British space official. He was born in Manchester. He served as a director-general of the European Space Research Organisation (ESRO). He was the first director-general of the European Space Agency (1975–1980) and the British National Space Centre (1985–1987). ==References== ==Other websites== *Roy Gibson at the British Library Category:1924 births Category:Living people Category:English businesspeople Category:English scientists Category:People from Manchester
title: Roy Gibson
